co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.cluster

Interface DistributedTree.Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedTree.ListenerAdapter
    Enclosing interface:
    DistributedTree

    public static interface DistributedTree.Listener
    A listener for DistributedTree node events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nodeAdded(String node)
      Invoked when a new node has been added to the tree.
      void nodeChildAdded(String node, String child)
      Invoked when a new child node of the listener's target node has been created.
      void nodeChildDeleted(String node, String child)
      Invoked when a child node of the listener's target node has been deleted.
      void nodeChildUpdated(String node, String child)
      Invoked when a child node's contents of the listener's target node has been modified.
      void nodeDeleted(String node)
      Invoked when a node has been deleted from the tree.
      void nodeUpdated(String node)
      Invoked when a node's contents has been modified.

    • Method Detail

      • nodeAdded

        void nodeAdded(String node)
        Invoked when a new node has been added to the tree.
        Parameters:
        node - The new node's full path.

      • nodeUpdated

        void nodeUpdated(String node)
        Invoked when a node's contents has been modified.
        Parameters:
        node - The updated node's full path.

      • nodeDeleted

        void nodeDeleted(String node)
        Invoked when a node has been deleted from the tree.
        Parameters:
        node - The deleted node's full path.

      • nodeChildAdded

        void nodeChildAdded(String node,
                  String child)
        Invoked when a new child node of the listener's target node has been created. nodeAdded will be called on a listener listening on the child node, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        node - The full path of the parent node.
        child - The simple name (without the full path) of the newly added child node.

      • nodeChildUpdated

        void nodeChildUpdated(String node,
                    String child)
        Invoked when a child node's contents of the listener's target node has been modified. nodeUpdated will be called on a listener listening on the child node, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        node - The full path of the parent node.
        child - The simple name (without the full path) of the updated node.

      • nodeChildDeleted

        void nodeChildDeleted(String node,
                    String child)
        Invoked when a child node of the listener's target node has been deleted. nodeDeleted will be called on a listener listening on the child node, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        node - The full path of the parent node.
        child - The simple name (without the full path) of the deleted child node.
